name: Pong (itch) (Renan Malveira Rodrigues)
description:
This version is built to more closely resemble the NES than the original Pong machines or the Atari 2600 in terms of resolution, though in widescreen (16:9) so it looks like nicer or modern system.

To execute the game:
Download the Pong.rar, extract and start the pong.exe

How to play:
Player 1 (Left Padle in the screen) - W for up, S for down.
Player 2 (Right Padle in the screen) - Arrow Up for up, Arrow Down for down.
Key Enter to start the game.
